column5: After getting a massive headache at work yesterday, decided to hit a local spot for couple of hours. I`ve seen some huge carp cruising, couple of smallmouths and some suckers. Managed to catch 3 or 4 carp and a 3 suckers and my line almost got tangled up with a snapping turtle, big one too. here are couple of pics. First a 27 inch sucker lol, didnt think they grew this big but here is one  and a 30 inch carp but really really fat   Quality of the pics isnt that great it was taken with my phone, 2MP
Congrats on you PB...measuring tape is missing...so I'm guessing 22.5"...cute toes btw.
Don't underestimate the size that suckers can reach.  Here in London,  the Thames has quite a few varieties of suckers and many of them are massive.  Lots of people mistake the big suckers for carp.
Nice bottom feeders Marko, congrats. Those pics look pretty good for a cell phone.
nice job, those are great photos for a cellphone if you ask me!
Thanks on the toes compliment twilight hahah, just realized one on my right leg looks broken
Congrats on your personal best's. Thanks for sharing.
Congrats.  The first one is a redhorse, probably a golden.
WTG Marko thats one fat carp thanks for the upgrade for our team(#6)that now puts us at 82 inches without OFAH.
